Control Name: Maintain strict control over the internal or external distribution of any kind of media, including the following:\nClassify media so the sensitivity of the data can be determined.

control_attributes.Control: Maintain strict control over the internal or external distribution of any kind of media, including the following:\nClassify media so the sensitivity of the data can be determined.
control_attributes.Requirement: 9.6.1. Restrict physical access to cardholder data
